verses.verse: לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> liḇ·nê- of the sons קֹ֭רַח <WH7141> qō·raḥ of Korah. ( The LORD Loves the Gates of Zion) מִזְמ֣וֹר <WH4210> miz·mō·wr A Psalm שִׁ֑יר <WH7892> šîr A song. יְ֝סוּדָת֗וֹ <WH3248> yə·sū·ḏā·ṯōw He has founded His city בְּהַרְרֵי־ <WH2042> bə·har·rê- mountains. ( Literally His foundation is on the holy mountains) קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> qō·ḏeš on the holy

אֹהֵ֣ב <WH157> ’ō·hêḇ loves יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD שַׁעֲרֵ֣י <WH8179> ša·‘ă·rê the gates צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> ṣî·yō·wn of Zion מִ֝כֹּ֗ל <WH3605> mik·kōl more than all מִשְׁכְּנ֥וֹת <WH4908> miš·kə·nō·wṯ the dwellings יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ of Jacob.

נִ֭כְבָּדוֹת <WH3513> niḵ·bā·ḏō·wṯ Glorious things מְדֻבָּ֣ר <WH1696> mə·ḏub·bār are ascribed בָּ֑ךְ Prep│2fs ( bāḵ) to you, עִ֖יר 5892 N-fsc ( ‘îr) O city הָאֱלֹהִ֣ים 430 Art│N-mp ( hā·’ĕ·lō·hîm) of God. סֶֽלָה׃ 5542 Interjection ( se·lāh) Selah

אַזְכִּ֤יר׀ <WH2142> ’az·kîr “ I will mention רַ֥הַב <WH7293> ra·haḇ Rahab ( Rahab is a poetic name for Egypt.) וּבָבֶ֗ל <WH894> ū·ḇā·ḇel and Babylon לְֽיֹ֫דְעָ֥י <WH3045> lə·yō·ḏə·‘āy among those who know Me — הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> hin·nêh along with פְלֶ֣שֶׁת <WH6429> p̄ə·le·šeṯ Philistia, וְצ֣וֹר <WH6865> wə·ṣō·wr Tyre, עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- and כּ֑וּשׁ <WH3568> kūš Cush — ( That is, the upper Nile region) זֶ֝֗ה <WH2088> zeh [when I say,] ‘This one יֻלַּד־ <WH3205> yul·laḏ- was born שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> šām [in Zion]. ’”

וּֽלֲצִיּ֨וֹן׀ <WH6726> ū·lă·ṣî·yō·wn of Zion: יֵאָמַ֗ר <WH559> yê·’ā·mar And it will be said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> ’îš “ This one וְ֭אִישׁ <WH376> wə·’îš and that one יֻלַּד־ <WH3205> yul·laḏ- were born בָּ֑הּ Prep│3fs ( bāh) in her, וְה֖וּא 1931 Conj-w│Pro-3ms ( wə·hū) Himself יְכוֹנְנֶ֣הָ 3559 V-Piel-Imperf-3ms│3fs ( yə·ḵō·wn·ne·hā) will establish her. ” עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ 5945 Adj-ms ( ‘el·yō·wn) and the Most High

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD יִ֭סְפֹּר <WH5608> yis·pōr will record בִּכְת֣וֹב <WH3789> biḵ·ṯō·wḇ in the register עַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> ‘am·mîm of the peoples: זֶ֖ה <WH2088> zeh “ This יֻלַּד־ <WH3205> yul·laḏ- one was born שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> šām [in Zion]. ” סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> se·lāh Selah

וְשָׁרִ֥ים <WH7891> wə·šā·rîm Singers כְּחֹלְלִ֑ים <WH2342> kə·ḥō·lə·lîm and pipers [will proclaim], כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kāl- “ All מַעְיָנַ֥י <WH4599> ma‘·yā·nay my springs [of joy] בָּֽךְ׃ Prep│2fs ( bāḵ) [are] in You. ”
